text: Edmund James Bradbury (born 10 September 1992) is a British cyclist, who currently rides for British amateur team Pearson Cycles. He previously rode professionally between 2015 and 2019 for the , and teams. ==Major results== ;2015 : 2nd Time trial, National Road Championships ;2019 : 1st 20px Mountains classification Tour of Xingtai : 2nd Overall Tour du Maroc : 7th Overall Tour de Taiwan ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:British male cyclists Category:English male cyclists Category:People from Surrey
title: Edmund Bradbury
